note: Explore 2 Africa is the best African tour operator, situated in the picturesque town of Moshi, Tanzania, nestled near the iconic Mount Kilimanjaro. With a rich legacy of excellence and a deep-rooted passion for showcasing the wonders of Africa, we specialize in curating unforgettable experiences across Tanzania and beyond. Our extensive range of offerings includes Tanzania safaris, Kilimanjaro climbing tours, Serengeti migration safaris, Zanzibar beach holidays, and Kenya safaris.
